Zone 2 • Visual Lens

Light Lattices & Photonic Flow

A Design Metaphor for Navigation

This page sits at the edge of science and design. "Photonic flow" and "light lattices" are used here as:

  • A visual navigation language
  • A coherence metaphor
  • A way to connect the Crystalline Matrix theme

Important: This is framed as education + model, not as a scientific claim.

What "Photonic Flow" Means Here

  • Visual pattern language — lattices, grids, geometric ordering
  • Coherence as metaphor — aligned, organized, structured
  • UI design principle — the 3-6-9 navigation architecture

It's a way to think about how information flows through the library—light as a metaphor for clarity.

Grounding in Measurement

If you want to explore actual light effects on water:

  • Light & Water — the 4 Pathways model
  • EZ Water — IR and exclusion zone research
  • Parameter Tracking — measurement discipline
